update.title: Version 3.0.1 Rolling Out
update.body: Version 3.0.1 is currently rolling out which adds tons of features and redesigned the entire app

roadmap.title: Add the ability to set categories for assignments
Add the ability to set light or dark theme for the app
Add the ability to like comments in the community board
Add the ability to set a default category for assignments
Add the ability to change caching options for media
Add the ability to load lower quality version of images to improve speed and save data
